name: PolyShot
description:
PolyShot takes place between two opposing teams. E-Girls group was born as anti-male groups came together. This cute but wild girl group aims to take over the BoyZ clan and create chaos across Polylandia to enforce their will. The Boys Government formed the specially trained Anti-Girls team, BoyZ, to thwart the activities of violent groups called E-Girls and destroy the group. Take your place in the relentless and fun fight between these two teams in PolyShot.

Players fight in PvP matches dominated by score. There are a maximum of 8 players on each side.
